thread.title: Penang-born artist gunning for record-making feat
thread.title_full: Penang-born artist gunning for record-making feat

title: Penang-born artist gunning for record-making feat
text:
More Penang-born caricaturist Mohd Azmi Mohd Hussin is out on a mission to dispel the perception that caricature is more than street art. He aims to draw 250 live caricatures in 24 hours, to earn a spot in The Malaysia Book of Records. Born in Butterworth, Penang, Mohd Azmi is a freelance cartoonist. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
